channel.title: Dragonholic Paid Chapters
channel.description: Aggregated RSS feed for paid chapters across mapped novels.

item.title: My Husband Became the Most Powerful Minister
item.description:
At the princess‚Äôs banquet, in a secluded hall, Helan Ci pressed her palm against the wall, encountering the equally disheveled newly crowned top scholar Lu Wuyou. One was as delicate as a willow, the other had a flushed face.

Their eyes met, and in each other‚Äôs gaze, they saw a glimmer of despair.
‚ÄúI‚Äôll go first‚Ä¶‚Äù
‚ÄúI‚Äôll head that way‚Ä¶‚Äù

However, what was even more despairing was the sound of the princess‚Äôs maid and the second prince‚Äôs attendant searching for them not far away.
Helan Ci bit her lip: ‚ÄúWhat don‚Äôt you just go to the princess?‚Äù
Lu Wuyou endured: ‚ÄúI think the second prince is not bad either.‚Äù
Helan Ci: ‚ÄúIf we keep talking, we‚Äôll only end up hurting each other!‚Äù
Lu Wuyou closed his eyes: ‚ÄúThen let it be a mutual destruction.‚Äù
Helan Ci: ‚Äú‚Ä¶?‚Äù

A night later, their innocence was lost, and they were forced into marriage. Yet, with strong enemies lurking, this marriage was extremely difficult. On one side, there was the second prince, eagerly awaiting her husband‚Äôs demise, and on the other, the princess, watching her with cold eyes.
Helan Ci asked, ‚Äú‚Ä¶Can you handle this?‚Äù
Lu Wuyou replied, ‚ÄúEven if I can‚Äôt, I have to. Who told me to marry you‚Äî I‚Äôm going to be a powerful minister. I can‚Äôt fall here.‚Äù
Helan Ci, ‚ÄúThen do your best! I‚Äôm counting on you!‚Äù
Lu Wuyou, ‚Äú‚Ä¶?‚Äù

Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past.

A student asked him how he had come this far.

Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress.

=====

Two chapters will be free every week (Sat & Sunday).

If you enjoy this story consider rate and review this at NovelUpdates, also support me at ko-fi

item.title: Dare to Cancel the Engagement? I Will Marry Your Ancestor!
item.description:
Mo Ling is transmigrated into another world and unexpectedly becomes a sect master. However, things don‚Äôt go as planned when Long Ziyan publicly breaks off their engagement, putting Mo Ling in a difficult position.

The Long family had originally fled to Beihan Prefecture and survived under the original Mo Ling‚Äôs protection, only to betray him later, causing his death. This allows Mo Ling to take over the body.

Facing internal and external challenges, Mo Ling finds himself at a critical juncture‚Ä¶

item.title: Transmigrated into the Villain's Cannon Fodder Ex-Wife (Transmigrated into a Book)
item.description:
Lin Chu, an engineering student, was following a novel and found the villain character especially compelling. When she read the part where the villain was forced to marry a manipulative woman during his downfall, Lin Chu couldn‚Äôt help but criticize the green tea character.

Who would have expected that she‚Äôd black out, only to become that very same troublesome woman who regretted her marriage to the villain on their wedding day and ultimately got herself killed?

Lin Chu: ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù

Stay calm, don‚Äôt panic.

Looking at the villainous husband, injured and returning from the battlefield, Lin Chu thought she had found her chance to escape her tragic fate by clinging to his leg for survival‚Ä¶

If you‚Äôre enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (KatTL) or report it in Dragonholic Discord server.

If you enjoy my translations and want to sprinkle a little joy in my cup, you can treat me to a coffee on Ko-fi or support me at Patreon! Your support means the world to me! ‚òïüíñ

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless‚Äîcapable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder‚Äôs script, Sheng Nuan is terrified‚Ä¶

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: ‚ÄúNuan Nuan, you‚Äôre not allowed to go anywhere except by my side‚Ä¶‚Äù

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: ‚ÄúNuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?‚Äù

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: ‚ÄúNuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.‚Äù

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: ‚ÄúNuan Nuan, it‚Äôs your choice‚Äîkill me, or save me.‚Äù

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked‚Ä¶

If you‚Äôre enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

item.title: Giving Interstellar Players a Horror Ghost Game Shock
item.description:
Ye Yuxi has lived in the interstellar world for 20 years and has just remembered that she is a proud transmigrator. Before her transmigration, she was an avid fan of horror games; after transmigrating, she coincidentally became a university student majoring in game design. In this interstellar world, where everyone is a tough, bloodthirsty warrior, violent and gory games are all the rage‚Äîmost notably, games about hunting insectoid aliens and zombies. A search across the star network reveals no concept of supernatural horror games at all!

What does this mean? It means there is a vast untapped blue ocean of opportunity!

With this in mind, Ye Yuxi rolls up her sleeves and decides to give the interstellar residents a little shock with horror female ghost!

She launches Campus Nightmare, and interstellar players are terrified: ‚ÄúI‚Äôve never been this scared of school!‚Äù

She releases Residential Area Battle Royale, and interstellar players cry: ‚ÄúThis isn‚Äôt the battle royale I‚Äôve played before!‚Äù

She rolls out A Loving Home, and interstellar players go crazy: ‚ÄúWhere‚Äôs my quilt barrier? Is there any safe place in this world?!‚Äù

Later, after receiving the 10,086th complaint message from a terrified player, Ye Yuxi calmly accepts an interview: ‚ÄúAt first, I just wanted to make a small game I‚Äôd enjoy. I never expected it to be so popular, so I ended up making a few more‚Ä¶‚Äù

Players who were scared out of their wits: ‚ÄúWe thank you!‚Äù

If you‚Äôre enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (KatTL) or report it at Dragonholic Discord server.

If you enjoy my translations and want to sprinkle a little joy in my cup, you can treat me to a coffee on Ko-fi or support me at Patreon! Your support means the world to me! ‚òïüíñ

item.title: Sweet Hunting Ground [GB]
item.description:
Ani belongs to a nearly extinct species with unparalleled mimicry abilities.

In order to survive, she joins the infamous interstellar live-streamed hunting game, taking on the form of a seemingly ordinary human girl‚Äîwide-eyed, innocent, and sweetly smiling.

No one expects such a fragile-looking human to last more than three days.

Yet, as the months pass, the audience watches in growing horror. Not only has this delicate girl survived, but she has fought her way into the finals. The once-dominant warriors, who were the center of attention, now flinch at the mere mention of her name, instinctively retreating as if facing their natural predator.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Ani bears the heavy responsibility of continuing her species. She is the last of her kind.

To ensure her race‚Äôs survival, she must seek out the strongest and most exceptional beings across the universe to reproduce with.

While her opponents view her as an enemy in a life-or-death battle, Ani has already begun her own special hunt.

Within her hunting grounds, bl00d turns sweet, pain transforms into pleasure, and slaughter weaves an inescapable web of desire.

And those caught in her web? They become hers‚Äîcompletely.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

At some point, the prey began to come to her willingly.

A man who was once formidable and battle-hardened, grasps her hand, and pressed it against his abdomen, willingly giving up his body for her to alter. He, who once struck fear across the battlefield, now stands before her with an almost desperate plea.

His voice is low, uncertain, yet filled with expectation.

‚ÄúAni‚Ä¶ You will take responsibility right?‚Äù

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Reader Advisory

[Suggestive Content Alert!]

‚Ä¢Technically not smut, but it‚Äôs not really suggested for U-18 either!!!

‚Ä¢Tentacle protagonist, male pregnancy.

‚Ä¢Niche themes, self-indulgent writing‚Äîproceed with caution if not your cup of tea.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Ani bears the heavy responsibility of continuing her species. She is the last of her kind.

To ensure her race‚Äôs survival, she must seek out the strongest and most exceptional beings across the universe to reproduce with.

While her opponents view her as an enemy in a life-or-death battle, Ani has already begun her own special hunt.

Within her hunting grounds, bl00d turns sweet, pain transforms into pleasure, and slaughter weaves an inescapable web of desire.

And those caught in her web? They become hers‚Äîcompletely.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

At some point, the prey began to come to her willingly.

A man who was once formidable and battle-hardened, grasps her hand, and pressed it against his abdomen, willingly giving up his body for her to alter. He, who once struck fear across the battlefield, now stands before her with an almost desperate plea.

His voice is low, uncertain, yet filled with expectation.

‚ÄúAni‚Ä¶ You will take responsibility right?‚Äù

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Reader Advisory

[Suggestive Content Alert!]

‚Ä¢Technically not smut, but it‚Äôs not really suggested for U-18 either!!!

‚Ä¢Tentacle protagonist, male pregnancy.

‚Ä¢Niche themes, self-indulgent writing‚Äîproceed with caution if not your cup of tea.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless‚Äîcapable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder‚Äôs script, Sheng Nuan is terrified‚Ä¶

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: ‚ÄúNuan Nuan, you‚Äôre not allowed to go anywhere except by my side‚Ä¶‚Äù

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: ‚ÄúNuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?‚Äù

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: ‚ÄúNuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.‚Äù

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: ‚ÄúNuan Nuan, it‚Äôs your choice‚Äîkill me, or save me.‚Äù

Sheng Nuan became even more panicked‚Ä¶

If you‚Äôre enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements.

Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).

item.title: After Rebirth, I Married my Archenemy
item.volume: Volume 2: A Blade Drawn on the Bowstring
item.description:
Before her death, Qun Qing hated the powerful official Lu Huating the most. She hated him for assisting the new emperor and for being cunning and insidious. She thought about him day and night, and tried her best to defeat him, but she was not his match. In the end, she became a cannon fodder in his hands.

After Qun Qing died, she saw the princess of the fallen country that she had protected with her life, crying and leaning on the new emperor‚Äôs chest: ‚ÄúQung Qing is dead, what should I do?‚Äù
The new emperor kissed her: ‚ÄúYou will be fine, just love me.‚Äù
The princess burst into tears, like a delicate flower under the rain: ‚ÄúQung Qing is dead, Your Majesty is all I have left.‚Äù

When she opened his eyes, Qun Qing had woke up three years ago. She stood up, woodenly packed her bags, and regardless of the princess‚Äôs obstruction, took off her jade crown and walked away, dropped her female official‚Äôs wooden seal, turned around and left, leaving behind ten years of careful planning and treading on thin ice.

Restore the country? Pfft, restore it my foot.
‚Äî‚Äî

The powerful minister Lu Huating is deeply cunning, ruthless, and dominates the power struggles of the court. Tired of the ugly nature of human hearts, his life has become dull and unfulfilling.

Looking back on his life, the only thing that left an impression was a female officer, a spy, whom he poisoned to death at the age of twenty-six.

For the love of the princess, she sacrificed his life for the country and schemed against him several times. In the end, she knelt in front of the Summer Palace, her facial expression remaining unchanged, with a look of resentment in her eyes, and sighed with a smile, ‚ÄúThe king who wins is the ruler, and the one who loses is the defeated,‚Äù before raising her head and drinking to the last drop. Bl00d poured from her lips, a thin layer of vivid red.

When he opened his eyes again, Lu Huating returned to his twenty-three-year-old self.

Lu Huating looked at the documents under his command, and felt even more bored. He put down his brush and leaned on the back of the chair: ‚ÄúWhere is the female official accompanying Crown Princess?‚Äù

‚Äú‚Ä¶ She resigned. She asked me to tell My lord that she would not fight anymore.‚Äù

Lu Huating was silent for a while, and curled his lips coldly: ‚ÄúShe said she won‚Äôt fight, so the fight is over?‚Äù

If you‚Äôre enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (KatTL) or report it at Dragonholic Discord server.

Release schedule: 1 chapter will be unlocked every 3 days. 1-2 advance chapters will be updated only on weekdays.

If you enjoy my translations and want to sprinkle a little joy in my cup, you can treat me to a coffee on Ko-fi or support me at Patreon! Your support means the world to me! ‚òïüíñ

item.title: Rebirth of the Excellent Daughter of the Marquis Household (REDMH)
item.nameextend: ***Could it be that they had to sleep together?***
item.description:
Gu Yu Qi, a daughter born to a marquis household. She was beautiful with knowledge in both civil and military, and her kindness broader than the sky. It was love at first sight for her, and she insisted on marrying him and was happy even if she were to become a mistress. She worked hard to help him step by step to become the emperor.

But what happened to her in the end?

For ten whole years, she was humiliated and abandoned. Disheartened, she drank poison to end her life and set her place on fire, only to find herself back to when she was ten years old. It was the year she followed her mother into the capital. It wasn‚Äôt too late to change her fate.

If Yun Ke had any regrets in his previous life, then it would be how he always kept thinking about a woman who died decades ago. Because of that, before he died, he secretly had the woman‚Äôs ashes pressed beneath his coffin. As the emperor, he had the final say of everything under the sky. So how could he allow that woman to be arrogant in front of him? Even at his deathbed, he would crush her beneath him.

Who knew he‚Äôd be reborn again‚Ä¶

When the transmigrated girl meets the boy who was reborn, Gu Yu Qi simply wanted to yell at the sky. Just what are you playing at!?

item.title: Sweet Hunting Ground [GB]
item.description:
Ani belongs to a nearly extinct species with unparalleled mimicry abilities.

In order to survive, she joins the infamous interstellar live-streamed hunting game, taking on the form of a seemingly ordinary human girl‚Äîwide-eyed, innocent, and sweetly smiling.

No one expects such a fragile-looking human to last more than three days.

Yet, as the months pass, the audience watches in growing horror. Not only has this delicate girl survived, but she has fought her way into the finals. The once-dominant warriors, who were the center of attention, now flinch at the mere mention of her name, instinctively retreating as if facing their natural predator.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Ani bears the heavy responsibility of continuing her species. She is the last of her kind.

To ensure her race‚Äôs survival, she must seek out the strongest and most exceptional beings across the universe to reproduce with.

While her opponents view her as an enemy in a life-or-death battle, Ani has already begun her own special hunt.

Within her hunting grounds, bl00d turns sweet, pain transforms into pleasure, and slaughter weaves an inescapable web of desire.

And those caught in her web? They become hers‚Äîcompletely.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

At some point, the prey began to come to her willingly.

A man who was once formidable and battle-hardened, grasps her hand, and pressed it against his abdomen, willingly giving up his body for her to alter. He, who once struck fear across the battlefield, now stands before her with an almost desperate plea.

His voice is low, uncertain, yet filled with expectation.

‚ÄúAni‚Ä¶ You will take responsibility right?‚Äù

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Reader Advisory

[Suggestive Content Alert!]

‚Ä¢Technically not smut, but it‚Äôs not really suggested for U-18 either!!!

‚Ä¢Tentacle protagonist, male pregnancy.

‚Ä¢Niche themes, self-indulgent writing‚Äîproceed with caution if not your cup of tea.

item.title: My Husband Became the Most Powerful Minister
item.description:
At the princess‚Äôs banquet, in a secluded hall, Helan Ci pressed her palm against the wall, encountering the equally disheveled newly crowned top scholar Lu Wuyou. One was as delicate as a willow, the other had a flushed face.

Their eyes met, and in each other‚Äôs gaze, they saw a glimmer of despair.
‚ÄúI‚Äôll go first‚Ä¶‚Äù
‚ÄúI‚Äôll head that way‚Ä¶‚Äù

However, what was even more despairing was the sound of the princess‚Äôs maid and the second prince‚Äôs attendant searching for them not far away.
Helan Ci bit her lip: ‚ÄúWhat don‚Äôt you just go to the princess?‚Äù
Lu Wuyou endured: ‚ÄúI think the second prince is not bad either.‚Äù
Helan Ci: ‚ÄúIf we keep talking, we‚Äôll only end up hurting each other!‚Äù
Lu Wuyou closed his eyes: ‚ÄúThen let it be a mutual destruction.‚Äù
Helan Ci: ‚Äú‚Ä¶?‚Äù

A night later, their innocence was lost, and they were forced into marriage. Yet, with strong enemies lurking, this marriage was extremely difficult. On one side, there was the second prince, eagerly awaiting her husband‚Äôs demise, and on the other, the princess, watching her with cold eyes.
Helan Ci asked, ‚Äú‚Ä¶Can you handle this?‚Äù
Lu Wuyou replied, ‚ÄúEven if I can‚Äôt, I have to. Who told me to marry you‚Äî I‚Äôm going to be a powerful minister. I can‚Äôt fall here.‚Äù
Helan Ci, ‚ÄúThen do your best! I‚Äôm counting on you!‚Äù
Lu Wuyou, ‚Äú‚Ä¶?‚Äù

Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past.

A student asked him how he had come this far.

Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress.

=====

Two chapters will be free every week (Sat & Sunday).

If you enjoy this story consider rate and review this at NovelUpdates, also support me at ko-fi
